website_summaries.verdict: Vizio's new M-Series of HDTVs shows you can get a big 4K screen with a very good picture without spending a whole lot of money.
cons: Menus occasionally looks a bit fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: This TV is a piece of crap. A little over 2 years old and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a piece of crap. A little over 2 years old and the picture randomly freezes. At that point I can either unplug and power cycle, or wait and the TV will reboot itself. It started about once a week and now happens about 3-4 time daily. After jumping though all the hoops with Vizio Support they offered me credit towards another piece of crap Vizio purchase. But I'll never own another Vizio TV the rest of my life. I will sell this to a Pawn shop and buy a different brand. Do not buy Vizio. Do not buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: SchoolAdmin LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv.
customer_reviews.text: Now before i start i just want say I don't have any other 4K devices to hook up to this TV all i have is an Xbox 360, a ps3, and a directv HD dvr. This TV is absolutely incredible! I watched "San Andreas" with my girlfriend on it and this past weekend i also watched "Age of Ultron" blu, "Yu-Gi-Oh! Bonds Beyond Time" blu and TMNT (2014) blu ( Don't judge, its a guilty pleasure) and i have played a few games like bioshock 2, and Naruto Shippuden: ultimate ninja storm revolution. My eyes felt like they were going to explode out of skull, it looks so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lively Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied...then it died after only 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Good television, good price, easy-to-configure. I was entirely satisfied until it died abruptly at just over 3 years' use. (For comparison: My prior television was purchased in 1993 and lasted until 2014.) I won't give this set one star because I liked it a lot while it lasted. But "they don't make them like they used to" hardly seems to cover a set that just BARELY outlives its warranty and then turns into a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: This TV is absolutely beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is absolutely beautiful!!!! It was easy to setup and incredibly light!! I can not believe the picture quality, I have owned nothing but Samsung for the past 5 years and that trend is all over. The picture quality is on par with Samsung but at a much better price!!! They only thing I would change is the app menu seems to pop up each time you turn it on, I would like a software update that would change this so that it only pops up when I engage it. Thank you Vizio for offer such a fantastic product and price!!
customer_reviews.author: James Escobar

customer_reviews.title: 5 hdmi inputs, but only one of which is 4K
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV in May 2015. I’ve had it that long and haven’t had the lighting or panel issues others have had. My only complaint was it only has one 4K input. Which at the time wasn’t a problem but now I have two 4K sources and have to pick and choose. The 4K port now is just starting to not recognize that anything is connected. I have to switch to another input and then back to get it to work. I figure it’s only going to get worse so I ordered a curved Samsung 4K with HDR. This one wasn’t too awful, but shouldn’t be having an issue like this just 2 and a half years in.
customer_reviews.author: Demon

customer_reviews.title: TV turns off randomly after 5-10 minutes of viewing.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I would have rated this 5 stars. picture quality was excellent, even better once the screen was calibrated. I can't answer to the sound as I am using a home theater system. however, after 2 years, it started to turn off randomly. initially I would just pause the DVR and rewind back to where I left off. but soon it started turning off every 5-10 min. I will not make the same mistake again, and will purchase an LG OLED. If I were you, I would stick with Sony, Samsung, LG or another reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: F. Paul, II

customer_reviews.title: 4K is incredible. There are plenty of 4K shows ...
customer_reviews.text: 4K is incredible. There are plenty of 4K shows on Amazon and Netflix. You can watch that content using the TVs built in Amazon and Netflix apps. I had problems with the tv early on, shimmering pixels around the screen. I reported it and provide a video. Vizio had a replacement hand delivered and installed. Then the installers took the old one and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Roetzel

customer_reviews.title: While it has a nice picture (at times)
customer_reviews.text: If I could go back, I would not purchase this TV. While it has a nice picture (at times), the one I received suffers greatly from the "dirty screen effect" (Google it). I called Vizio to see if this was normal and they said to take a picture of it and then they could submit a warranty claim. However, this is next to impossible for this kind of issue since this problem only occurs when things are moving rapidly on the screen and taking a picture of this does not show anything. Other than this issue, it's a nice product, but this is a deal breaker with me. Never will buy a Vizio again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Starr

customer_reviews.title: We've owned this tv for two years and cannot recommend. The screen freezes several times per day requiring ...
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this tv for two years and cannot recommend. The screen freezes several times per day requiring a reboot. Picture looks decent but if you're watching a movie or program and the screen freezes, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: slipknot

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this tv for a few months now and its an EXCELLENT tv. Especially for the price! Sound is crisp, picture is very clear, accurate colors. ONLY drawback ive noticed are the tv stands feet are WAY too far apart.. you have to have a wide surface to set this tv on. I ended up buying a nice piece of pine and stained it to match. Other than that its a great tv
customer_reviews.author: SaharaJeepguy

customer_reviews.title: all look great. Gaming mode is a must for lag
customer_reviews.text: Can run 4k games effectively with a gtx 970 with 4:4:4 chroma @ 60 fps. GTA V, fifa 15, you name it, all look great . Gaming mode is a must for lag. Takes a bit to get readjusted to even the slight lag in gaming mode, but after an evening or two I hardly notice the lag anymore when gaming. Just make sure your settings dont revert to standard or calibrated. Seemed to do that on me at first. Also watching bloodline and other netflix shows in 4k on the vizio app is nice.
customer_reviews.author: C K S

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I loved Vizio for years because my BF has an old one and it looks sharp. This new one my wife and me bought is all you can want in a UHD smart TV. Picture is as good as it gets with todays tech, it's Retina display perfect, the price is much lower than the 'big' brands, and customer service for setup was amazing, immediate connection, and a really relaxed agent who insisted that everything was working before letting me go. That's what I imagine buying a Mercedes is like :) Sound is really good for this thin an enclosure, I do recommend investing in a soundbar to get the full impact of this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jan

customer_reviews.title: this tv crashes when streaming netflix and amazon prime video ...
customer_reviews.text: this tv crashes when streaming netflix and amazon prime video about every hour. There is a loud clicking sound that comes through the speakers every minute or so as well. I assume I have a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Katzman

customer_reviews.title: Active LED zones issue
customer_reviews.text: The active LED zones are very apparent, big blocks of light break up the picture even when this feature is turned off. Otherwise its a very attractive and capable unit. UPDATE: I took my unit off the wall and noticed it is missing the screws for the stands. VIZIO told me they would sell me replacement stands (with screws) for $150 dollars. All I want is the size and length of the screws so I can go to a hardware store to pickup replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: died just shy of three years :(
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the tv however, the picture simply died yesterday. I have sound, no picture, no menu will appear. Vizio was not helpful when I contacted customer support. Gave me a number to an outside repair company for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At 23 months, now I have display issues...
customer_reviews.text: Under light residential use (5 hours or less per week average), this TV lasted 23 months without an issue. Now I have a horizontal stripe across the TV where pixels aren't updating properly. Convenient that the TV had only a 1 year warranty. I purchased with a Chase Freedom card, so now looking to their +1 year warranty to see if I'm covered in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 4K TV! best value out there!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic 4K TV! The active LED zones do make a difference. You can watch so much 4K content through Netflix/YouTube, that you will not be dissapointed. The only step up worth investing in would be OLED TV's, but those come at a high price. If you do play video games or use as a computer monitor, make sure you set it to "game mode" and turn off all the processing to stop the video lag.
customer_reviews.author: ZombiePartz

customer_reviews.title: We bought this tv in August of 2015 and two ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tv in August of 2015 and two years later the screen is not working. It has lightened in color and has lines running through it. The Amazon replacement period has passed and Vizio will do nothing for us. They are saying since we didn't buy a warranty they can't help us. A television should last longer than two years. We have many other brands that have so from now on we will avoid buying Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: James Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 2 yrs...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV for 2 years. Today it started up with a blue line running vertically down the screen and the bottom 1/5 flickers constantly. Not a high quality TV... It was decent while it lasted, but now I know why it was so inexpensive. Must be made with cheap components. The TV is unwatchable now.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: dies after two years
customer_reviews.text: This TV was never to sold by vizio because it defected. Many online owner of this TV has the same complain. even the TV repairman confirm it. That the mother board is defected. Vizio couldn't care less if you bought it. I had a warranty for two years and three month after the warranty it failed. Vizio only said sorry. Don't buy any Vizio TV's they all have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: great picture, and enough connection potential to accommodate any ...
customer_reviews.text: Doubtless to say that this TV is a remarkable success, great picture, and enough connection potential to accommodate any electronic companion to enhance your desire in electronic supremacy in home entertainment. The sound component is weak, but one can add a sound bar to compensate for this; this is minor if one considers the price. You get more value for your money for this choice of TV.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Petit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tv. I like the full keyboard on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv. I like the full keyboard on the back of the remote control. The TV does everything you need. Beautiful 4k picture. Not bad sound quality from built in speakers, but like with all tv's, your are better off installing a soundbar or something. This has a a lot of HDMI ports...I believe the count is 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture and overall good performance. A great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was always a Samsung fan, and was hesitant to try the "Walmart brand". But the great reviews and impressive technology for the price level made me think twice. I know there is a later version of this set, but this one is superior. After a few months of use, I have to say that the price I paid for this 65" TV was a good deal. As good a picture as any LED set I've seen in a home installation. Not too impressive in regards to internet access- no independent search engine capability- but runs the apps adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Adams

customer_reviews.title: First got mine refurbished from VIPOUTLET just amazed how flawless it was
customer_reviews.text: First got mine refurbished from VIPOUTLET just amazed how flawless it was, always been skeptical of having a TV shipped, not from them that thing was ready for a war, had a three year old Vizeo and was so impressed with the picture I now have gone 4k, very sharp only at 30Hz cause I have yet to find a true cable that will handle 60Hz, most claim but I got nothing but lag, 30Hz is blue ray by eye so 60 double if I can actually get one not a 60Hz claim, otherwise super sharp even at 30hz, I suspect my cable box for sure
customer_reviews.author: John T. Kesil

customer_reviews.title: Great picture when it is on and not cycling!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV on 3/4/16 & occasionally it would restart on its own. I never thought much bout it since I rarely watched TV, but recently I completed my college courses and have had more time to watch NCAA sports only to realize the TV cycles on & off quite often. I have reported the issue to Vizio so we will see what they say. I did do a web search on this TV & the issue I am having is quite common. If it were not for this issue I would give the TV 5 stars - it has a great picture!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Immediately started flickering after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality when it worked. Really handy remote. But as soon as TV older than 4 years severe flickering started. Getting worse over time. Also not supporting newer apps from Vizio. May as well since it’s not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian H.

customer_reviews.title: Best electronic purchase I have made since getting crossfire graphics ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it all day every day. Best electronic purchase I have made since getting crossfire graphics cards. (Which now that I have windows 10, they are properly utilized to run every single game I have on this TV too!- I wouldn't try playing games on this at anything higher than medium settings if you aren't in SLI/Crossfire). The smart functions (netflix, amazon, etc) make this especially awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadDawg2070

customer_reviews.title: Good smart buy.
customer_reviews.text: Have had since Christmas, and very happy with picture, color, size, narrow banding around TV. Also price! Have it mounted on the wall. Our second Vizio and our American Legion uses them for several years, with no problem. They have theirs on all day long and so do I. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV - until it died after 3 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice TV. So nice that I bought two of them for our home. The picture was great and it was easy to use. The bad part is that it died on me yesterday after just 3 1/2 years. It powers on but the screen is just black. Called Vizio service. They had me restart the TV (which I had already done). That didn't fix it so they put me on hold, came back and told me I was pas warranty and out of luck. Told me to take it to a repair shop or get a new TV. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Rsquire

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to very strongly advice against buying any Vizio TV. Mine broke within a month of the 1-year warranty expiring. It simply stopped turning on, and the internet is full of similar reports. Visio then promised that if I prepaid $330, a technician would show up with the required part. No one had to look at the TV ahead of time because the problem is apparently so widespread, they knew what was wrong without needing any explanation. Worst: said technician never showed, they are not responding to calls, and I am down the original $900 plus the additional $330. Will contact better business bureau.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TV !!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME TV !!! Unbelievable picture quality from this 4K Ultra system. Buy this and you will not regret it. I found the 55 inch to be the best value. The sound is ok. I dropped the VIZIO SB4051-C0 40-Inch 5.1 Sound Bar System on it and the set up is freaking awesome. I am 60 years old and I am hearing things I have never heard in years from a TV set. It is easy to configure the set with the guided setup. If you are a bit tweaker. This has tweaks for ever aspect of the system.
customer_reviews.author: JTB 19702

customer_reviews.title: Tv does not work after month and a half
customer_reviews.text: Tv stopped working after a month of buying... picture scrambles and then turns black.. its unwatchable and sais can not be returned after 30 days... I paid a lot of money for this tv for it not to work.. and it's impossible to contact Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent UHD-TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture is super-sharp, the sound is clear and the surround sound is amazing. Two features I really like are the sound leveling which keeps commercials from blasting at top volume and the picture can be set to adjust to room lighting which helps on sunny days. UHD makes the picture much sharper and detailed. Haven't had a chance to use the Smart TV features yet.
customer_reviews.author: H-Spike

customer_reviews.title: Screen defective after about 2.5-3 years
customer_reviews.text: Screen has major defect that appeared after about 2.5-3 years of use. A thin horizontal line appeared across the screen that distorts colors, and after searching for this problem online, it appears there are many others who have encountered this same defect. Unfortunately, the consensus seems to be that the cost to repair is enough that it would just be better to put that money toward a new TV. This is extremely disappointing, and I wouldn't recommend buying a Vizio after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck 4k out there.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv, great picture quality. The apps are ok, but get the job done. Some of the apps freeze and you need to restart the tv, but who knows there the problem for that lies. Overall, one of the best bang for the buck 4k tvs. I did tons of research and it was down to this or the Samsung 7000 series.I went for this one because it was $600 cheaper and almost no difference in quality or features. Maybe not as thin... I've had it for a year with no issues, and tho it is an older model, the newer ones will be just that more impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hirst

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great and it was simple to set up with one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 43" version and set it up last night. The picture is great and it was simple to set up with one exception. The built in apps were a giant pain to configure. Ultimately the Wi-Fi receiver in the TV wouldn't maintain a consistent connection to my secure router without me registering the MAC address of the TV to my network. Once that was done it worked great, but it took me an hour of troubleshooting to get to that point. Otherwise though this thing is light weight and a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Are you KIDDING ME!
customer_reviews.text: 1/31/2020 Just died today, too short a time for what I thought was a brand new product. Guess again, Never again Amazon. No more electronics for me from you.:-(
customer_reviews.author: Emil Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I would expect a TV I paid over $600 for ...
customer_reviews.text: I would expect a TV I paid over $600 for would last at least two years. Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love..
customer_reviews.text: I love...love...love my TV! The LCD panel is great, the WiFi performance is on point and lots of HDMI ports. Love the fact that there are those with ARC support and full 4K support. The internet app selection is also pretty good, with most of the usual suspects accounted for with the exception of HBO. More importantly it was excellent value for the money. I went from a Samsung LCD TV to this and have been very happy. I'm definitely a Vizio fan now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vanhorn

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific tv. Clarity, quality, sound - all excellent. Amazon shipping is astoundingly good - they brought it up to my loft, unboxed it, set it on the TV cabinet, made sure I was happy with it. They did not connect all the wires/cables (and I did not expect them too anyway), just so you are prepared. We connected everything to our Cox tuner/DVR (wish I could review how dismal Cox is) and everything works very well.
customer_reviews.author: DeaB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV for the Price. This TV is not going to be as crystal clear as some of the $3,000 Samsung's you see at Best Buy on display but if you are in the market for a new TV in one of these sizes the extra $100-200 is worth it to grab one of these Vizio 4K TVs. Great colors, smooth picture. I have had no issues with movies or gaming. The Netflix in 4K looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Skates

customer_reviews.title: great tv and super picture
customer_reviews.text: great tv and super picture. being used with direct tv and a samsung 4k blu ray player both produce sharp picture and bright clear colors and blacks that are realy black not dark gray like like regular 1080 sets. there are 2 four inch speakers on the back left and right sides that produce clear full range sound even when turned up . the picture is clear and bright vued at a 45 degree angle it then fades some at a greater angle.over all this is a great set and is a recomended buy.
customer_reviews.author: lennlundmanmoab

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Died an Early Death
customer_reviews.text: The TV had already been repaired before. Called customer service and they said they wouldn't repair it now that the warranty had run out and hung up on me. No longer a Vizio customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Low glare. Awesome remote
customer_reviews.text: It was a great tv with a great picture. Mine unfortunately only lasted about 10 months but the manufacturer Vizio replaced it with a larger 55 inch D-series for free. I liked the m series better because it had less glare and also has the best remote with query keyboard on the back side which you can purchase for about $12 separately. I would recommend this tv still as long as you get an extended warranty to go with it just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Coax09

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Does not work after two years. Wastage of money. I have Sony Bravia still working after 10 yrs Called Vizio support and unhelpful Will not buy Vizio again
customer_reviews.author: A.Shah

customer_reviews.title: Picture not clear on some channels.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the TV for about 18 months, I have it hooked up to antenna for local channels and it does not process the channel for clear viewing. Replaced the antenna, for any updates in the past year.. same problem occurs ( not a clear picture ) Up until 2 months ago, the tv worked great. the TV works great on Netflix or internet based reception.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gieck

customer_reviews.title: ... app bar is meant to keep you subscribing to useless and wasteful web services
customer_reviews.text: The app bar is meant to keep you subscribing to useless and wasteful web services. There is no Kodi app, no Kodi app installation possible either. Quality good, better than my Samsung 1080p for sure. HDMI ports and USB, nice. DLNA support works well with my multimedia DLNA router wireless or direct connect is so cool! Thanks for the MKV media file support!!! H.265 nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two(2) years into the warranty the TV start to flicker while on warranty. I contacted VIZIO and they could only provided little or no assistance. Told me to check with a local repair shop as they could only offer online support via a chatroom. I will NEVER BUY another VIZIO, they have lost my support and money for life.
customer_reviews.author: Sean AnHu

customer_reviews.title: Long term failure, a warning about Vizio's quality
customer_reviews.text: Over 3 years this TV has developed multiple defects. First after the 1st year the TV started displaying a blue line from top to bottom, just when the warrantee was out. After 2 years one of back-light zones is on dim, Going on three years a second back-light zone has failed. I would stay away from Vizio products, unless you plan on buying a TV every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen is not viewable anymore ..owned it less then 1.5yrs!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 1.5yrs. I don't watch it much as its the 2nd TV at home. 2 months ago I turn it on and the screen displays half of the upper part over the bottom of the screen making it impossible to watch TV as the screen is layered and showing 2 different images over itself. ...will see if they replace it ..stay tuned..I don't recommend buying this until you know how this gets resolved.. Im sure no one else wants to be in my current position with this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Its a throw away TV Only lasted 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 years of very limited usage. If you see other 1 star reviews they agree this seems to be about all you will get out of this TV is 2.5 years unless your lucky.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hauck

customer_reviews.title: This TV is unbelievable and fantastic. It's the perfect size for our space and ...
customer_reviews.text: If there was 10 stars, I'd give this double the normal. This TV is unbelievable and fantastic. It's the perfect size for our space and the clarity is phenomenal. Some shows look better than others, but it has CHANGED our expectations when watching sports. The smart-tv part is easy to use, intuitive and works consistently. (I have another smart tv that the apps never work). I actively think to myself on occasion "I LOVE THIS TV".
customer_reviews.author: Sahkira

customer_reviews.title: Slow power-on boot-up - but overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It takes much too long to boot-up when power is applied. The screen is not well organized since the remote does it 2 different ways depending on the current state of the TV at the moment the "V" is pressed. The remote is kinda funky since it is not too intuitive. But the picture is pretty good. Overall we like it after getting used to it. Being 80 inches, we like being able to see it from a distance. If it did a much faster boot-up I'd have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was described as like new with all the factory parts and accessories
customer_reviews.text: It was described as like new with all the factory parts and accessories. It came and was scuffed up around all the corners like it had been scratched against a wall or something and it did not have its manual. It does work just fine. Its just aggravating that it wasn't exactly advertised correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The built in apps (such as YouTube) freeze constantly, ...
customer_reviews.text: The built in apps (such as YouTube) freeze constantly, and are essentially unusable. Had I known the apps would freeze so often (once every hour, at least) I would have purchased a different TV. No update has ever fixed this problem in owning the TV for around 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad TV at all.
customer_reviews.text: There is a loose screw rolling around in side the TV, can't seem to get the the TV to stream 4k to the Roku 4, not sure if it is the Roku's fault or the TV's yet. The picture takes a lot of adjusting to get right as well. All and all a good buy if you can find it on sale. I am really worried about the loose screw however...
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Didn't make it a year before a defect showed up. Horizontal lines across the screen that a few other people have had issues with.
customer_reviews.author: Draper Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: TV DIED
customer_reviews.text: TV worked fine at the beginning but died after just 3 years. Then the warranty I purchased would not honor the contract.
customer_reviews.author: Allen C/ Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality but only 2 HDMI ports
customer_reviews.text: Like- picture quality is excellent Didn’t like- power supply went out while under warranty within the first year that was 100% covered Only 2 HDMI ports (reason for 4 stars)
customer_reviews.author: Purpchin65

customer_reviews.title: So Far, No Good...
customer_reviews.text: Received my VIZIO M43-C1 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV several hours ago, and could never get the Internet functions to work correctly, despite approximately 1.5 hours of online chat help with VIZIO reps. I am receiving a replacement from VIZIO "within 7-10 days". Can't say I am impressed with the TV or the service yet... pretty disappointed, actually. Perhaps it will improve.
customer_reviews.author: micpoc

customer_reviews.title: Great as a 4K monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great as a 4K monitor, beautiful picture. 4 stars because it often requires restarting the TV to sync its imagery after plugging in my Macbook Pro to it.
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a fantastic budget entry point into 4K UHD. The picture quality is excellent, largely due the LED full array backlighting. Contrast and black levels are superb. Color reproduction, viewing angles and upscaling are all solid. Soap opera effect is practically non-existant with updated firmware and the "Reduce Jutter" set to 0%. The smart TV functions well, but suffers from a lack of channels if you're looking for content beyond Netflix, Hulu, Amazon and Youtube. I'd love to see more networks (where's ESPN?), a Kodi app of some sort and a web browser. The QWERTY keyboard on the remote is nice, but voice search would be even better. All in all, an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: This tv looks so great. the colors are so rich and the refresh ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This tv looks so great. the colors are so rich and the refresh rate is outta this world for the price. the best integration of a youtube and netflix app ive seen on any device. i have a chromecast that no longer gets used because of this tv. been going strong since november '15. ive hooked up my 4k gaming pc to it to really test the limits and played a few games with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Great,  but with some issues
customer_reviews.text: How surprising that a cheap freaking TV is actually not all that bad. Only thing I'd like better is if you could actually surf a browser - your limited to only a hand full of Internet like apps...
customer_reviews.author: TestsbySeth

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. It died after having it for three years.
customer_reviews.author: JCDeacs

customer_reviews.title: picture quality is excellent and overall it's amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wifi signal reception is weaker than other devices right next to it, picture quality is excellent and overall it's amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey DB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture, great built in apps and zero lag ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, great built in apps and zero lag which is HUGE. I could not recommend this enough. After coming from more expensive Samsung tv's that I paid twice as much for this is just as nice with more features.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 ain't bad
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and easy set up. But I have noticed it seems brighter the farther out the viewing angle is. Have not been able to find a setting to fix this, but overall a damn good picture both blu ray and cable. I have not watched any 4k source on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Yahoo operating system is horrible and blocks channels from Google, Roku etc. Also after about a year to started booting up with scrambled screen. I have to turn on and off 2-5 times to get it to fix itself. I just bought TCL to replace Vizio. I'm going to sell on Craigslist
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working completely just over 4 years after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product, but it stopped working entirely out of the blue after just over 4 years.. I have other TVs (Vizio and other brands) that are 10-15 years old and still work perfectly fine. Very frustrated that I have to buy a new tv because this wasn’t made to a high quality standard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Television. Shopped all of the popular brands
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Television. Shopped all of the popular brands, Sanyo, Sharp, etc. The VIZIO was my choice based on clear picture, wifi, and easy to set up. Shopped the stores first before I made my decision.
customer_reviews.author: SASCHU

customer_reviews.title: Line across screen
customer_reviews.text: After only having this TV for 1 month I noticed a huge line across the screen. I have to use my warranty I purchased the get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: SONIA

customer_reviews.title: downright impressive, not just for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great! VIZIO’s UHD upscaling, everything you watch immediately transforms into 4K UHD... VERY nice, 4k content is not so easy to find. Was a little nervous going with VIZIO, historically seems to be a bargain brand. However, NOT the case and downright impressive.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Happy! Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Samsung 43" 60hz and had to send it back. Stay away from the Samsung. I decided to go with the Vizio 43" 4K and I am very happy, A lot better TV for $80 bucks more. Picture is great and the smart apps work well. Best TV for the money and it is 4K!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV.... When Calibrated
customer_reviews.text: This TV is Beautiful... When Calibrated Properly, as others have said. I don't profess to be an expert at Calibration, but having read countless articles on calibrating this TV, I do believe I have found semi-optimal settings for most users. I have attached screenshots of my settings menu.
customer_reviews.author: Iwritereviewssometimes

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 3 years of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: Completely dead after three years of moderate use. Remote is brittle garbage.
customer_reviews.author: alpha

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a different model migh not freeze  I'd look into other models and choose a model without this flaw
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing. The only thing that needs improving is it freezes occasionally and I have to shut it off and turn it back on. Most times that is all that is required to unfreeze it. Some times it requires to be off for a bit. That is the only complaint. But at times a big one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pictures quality, but decent build. especially in regards to the screen,
customer_reviews.author: junior kameni

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and apps
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and apps. The PLEX app is not even close to the app on other devices, but at least you can use it...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan FloTexan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Tv picture was great but tv failed to work in year 3. Simply froze. Vizio did nothing to help. Have had Sony and Samsung. Will not go back to Vizio
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV from a great company
customer_reviews.text: Great TV from a great company!!! Smart Bargains 4 U really step up and made a bad situation better. The first unit I received was damaged in shipping. They found a local distributor and personally looked into the packaging and had a different company ship it out pronto!!! Unit arrived undamaged and couldn't be happier with the TV. It is my first 4K TV and the picture is astonishing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen

customer_reviews.title: TV only lasted two years but everything was fine
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with picture quality audio quality none of those the issue I got to this TV is that it only last two years
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Vizio 50" Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: OMG! We love our Vizio TV. Never thought I would need one this big but now that we have it could not live without. Vizio is on of the best and given a choice I would buy them over anyone else's. THX amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV..Had for a year now and would definitely buy again. Especially at the new prices!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cole

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 years I have lines on my picture. My 2nd failed Vizio in 5 years. Vizio is no longer a good brand.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's okay wish I had gotten a big TV. I haven't had any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good value at the price. I use it for gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price it's not bad at all! But you will need to play with settings to get it looking good while connecting to PC though.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine Palazkov

customer_reviews.title: The picture on this TV is beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this TV is beautiful.... except when it is a purely bright color. You can see some fluctuations in the picture when there is a bright scene on screen. You get what you pay for, but I couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kub

customer_reviews.title: good tv, excellent for price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good picture. Am using the SONOS soundbar with it but the TV sound was reasonable without it. However, I would definitely invest in a soundbar or surround sound sort of product to maximize the entertainment value.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert H. Pass MD

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Won't turn on, or if it does only half the screen has a picture, or its black with a green stripy square. Lasted allnot one year. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glick

customer_reviews.title: Screen doesn't turn on...power indicator flashes and dims every so often.
customer_reviews.text: My tv stop working after 10 months. The screen doesn't turn on but the light indicator flashes and dims every so often! It really sucks when you spend so much money on something you've worked so hard to get and the product doesn't hold up to expectations. I don't know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Worked For 2 years then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This tv was ok until it just stopped turning on. I Have a samsung 40 lcd that i have had for 10 years that still works and this one didnt even last 3. Piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Cody W.

customer_reviews.title: Never buying Vizio again
customer_reviews.text: Worst TV I have ever owned. Backlights have continually failed over and over. Can't wait to trash this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: soo

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. I bought it from Amazon and I'm very pleased with the quality of the picture and the quality of the TV. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: KYRambo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the cost. I mostly use it for gaming and it works great. It kinda annoys me that VIZIO doesn't just send updates to their HD TV's to enable 3D functionality. It's just an artificial way of overcharging for a software feature. That's why I think 3D hasn't really taken off in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price, crystal clear and bright. If you don't mind a slight bit of input lag you can use this as a giant computer monitor. I'm getting 2160p from the HDMI port of a macbook pro.
customer_reviews.author: George L

customer_reviews.title: I've seen better TVs, but the price to quality math on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok, for the price. I've seen better TVs, but the price to quality math on this model works out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, excellent quality. I love having built in netflix and hulu on the TV. Plus, it is wireless which was a huge plus. TV is very thin and saves a lot of room on my TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Tv gets super hot and gets hot flashes.
customer_reviews.text: Tv didn't last a year hardly. Lines formed in it.never buy another vizio switch to tcl55
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Slade

customer_reviews.title: TV died after 3 months, got a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV, performance is great. After about 3 months there was a black faded blotch on the screen. Called Vizio and was able to get a replacement unit free because of the warranty. Not sure if this is a problem for others but I would be weary.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Green

product_meta.title: VIZIO M65-C1 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2015 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:65-InchIntroducing the all-new VIZIO M-Series Ultra HD Full-Array LED Smart TV. With over 8.3 million pixels in every image, four times the resolution of 1080p Full HD, M-Series Ultra HD displays produce breathtaking detail and clarity. Full-Array LED backlighting and up to 32 Active LED Zones deliver superior light uniformity with an extremely high contrast, and deep, pure black levels. Active Pixel Tuning enables pixel-level brightness adjustments for increased picture accuracy and contrast. And with up to Clear Action 720, sports and action fans will appreciate the powerful image processing of the M-Series with a blazing 240Hz effective refresh rate enhanced with backlight scanning for sharper detail in fast action scenes. In addition, the beautifully designed M-Series is optimized to deliver all of your favorite entertainment in stunning 4k Ultra HD right out of the box. Thanks to HEVC decoding and ultra-fast 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi (up to 3x faster¹), you’ll get Ultra HD streaming from popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Instant Video and UltraFlix². Its powerful Spatial Scaling Engine beautifully transforms your favorite 720p and 1080p HD sports, movies, and TV shows into near Ultra HD. And support for the latest HDMI standards enables Ultra HD playback from next generation cable and satellite receivers, Blu-ray players and game consoles. It all adds up to a beautifully simple experience where the picture is everything and nothing is more captivating! ¹ Source: IEEE standard 802.11 specifications. Maximum throughput rate of 802.11ac (1300 Mbps) is approximately three times faster than that of 802.11n (450 Mbps). Actual rate will vary, and will be subject to router model, site environment, range, Internet bandwidth and other factors. ²High-speed/Broadband Internet service and access equipment are required and not provided by VIZIO.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Backlight: LED (Full Array w/ 32 Active LED Zones)
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 57.4” x 32.9” x 2.5”, TV with stand: 57.4” x 35.4” x 11.2”
